channel.title: conf on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in conf on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: saleor 设置 templates base
item.description: 安装完了 saleor ，下一步，自然就是修改一些我们自己的Logo，页脚之类的东西了。 页脚COPYRIGHT (saleor) ➜ saleor git:(master) ✗ grep "COPYRIGHT © 2009–2019 MIRUMEE SOFTWARE" -rn ./ ./templates/base.html:296: <div class="col-8 footer__copy-text">COPYRIGHT © 2009–2019 MIRUMEE SOFTWARE</div> (saleor) ➜ saleor git:(master) ✗ 把这里修改成我们自己的 (saleor) ➜ saleor git:(master) ✗ vi templates/base.html (saleor) ➜ saleor git:(master) ✗ grep "COPYRIGHT © 2009–2019 " -rn ./ ../../../templates/base.html:296: <div class="col-8 footer__copy-text">COPYRIGHT © 2009–2019 谦谦科技</div> (saleor) ➜ images git:(master) ✗ 页脚Logo 只要审查元素就知道，这个 LOGO是 SVG图像。 <div class="col-4"> <a href="{% url 'home' %}" class="footer__logo float-md-left"> <svg data-src="{% static "images/logo-document.
